item.title: Trump admin links Tylenol use in pregnancy to increased risk of autism
item.description: The Trump administration stated on Monday that the use of an over-the-counter pain medication during pregnancy may be linked to autism.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Tens of thousands attend Charlie Kirk memorial
item.description: Tens of thousands of people paid tribute to Charlie Kirk at his memorial on Sunday. Kirk was hailed a "martyr" by President Donald Trump and other lea...

item.title: WATCH: Jimmy Kimmel returns to ABC on Tuesday after suspension
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel is set to return to the air Tuesday night on ABC, The Walt Disney Company said.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel to return to air on Tuesday
item.description: The Walt Disney Co. issued a statement Monday about Kimmel's return.
